title: tip doesn't compile
body:
https://github.com/golang/go/commit/837984f37291f4fc48f9c99b65b0ab3f050bf4b9 broke tip:

```
......
cmd/link/internal/ld
cmd/asm
cmd/nm
cmd/objdump
# os/user
os/user/listgroups_unix.go:29: cannot use _cgo0 (type interface {}) as type unsafe.Pointer in argument to _cgoCheckPointer0: need type assertion
os/user/lookup_unix.go:56: cannot use _cgo0 (type interface {}) as type unsafe.Pointer in argument to _cgoCheckPointer0: need type assertion
os/user/lookup_unix.go:144: cannot use _cgo0 (type interface {}) as type unsafe.Pointer in argument to _cgoCheckPointer0: need type assertion

cmd/internal/pprof/plugin
# net
net/cgo_unix.go:100: cannot use _cgo0 (type interface {}) as type unsafe.Pointer in argument to _cgoCheckPointer0: need type assertion
net/cgo_unix.go:144: cannot use _cgo0 (type interface {}) as type unsafe.Pointer in argument to _cgoCheckPointer0: need type assertion
cmd/internal/pprof/symbolz
cmd/internal/pprof/report
